entry.title: Visualizations of Votes
entry.summary: The author of a post is looking for visualizations of votes, specifically ones that include pie graphs of what percent are voting for various BIPs. They provided a link to a visualization website they liked, but noted that it only covered how developers feel about various BIPs. The author is interested in a visualization that describes miner voting visually and in real-time. They also included links to their website and protocol concept.
